title: "Task Wallpapers"
content: Task Wallpapers is a website that provides minimalist wallpapers designed to help you stay organized and productive. Our wallpapers feature a simple graphic of a digital calendar or to-do list, with plenty of space for notes and reminders. Whether you're looking to keep track of your daily tasks, upcoming deadlines, or important appointments, our wallpapers are the perfect way to stay on top of your schedule. With a clean and clutter-free design, our wallpapers are both functional and aesthetically pleasing, making them a great addition to any workspace. So why wait? Download one of our Task Wallpapers today and start getting organized!

prompts.title:
Write me short (max 3 words) title for website with main wallpaper that is:

"A wallpaper with a simple graphic of a digital calendar or to-do list, with space for notes and reminders."

The title should not be 1:1 copy of the prompt but rather a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.
prompts.content:
Write me some content for this website in markdown format.
The content should be a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.

- You can include UTF-8 emojis
- You can use formatting like **bold** or _italic_
- Do not describe the wallpaper itself, but rather the website which is using it.
- Do not start with any title - title will be included automatically
- Do not include links
- Do not include images
